bibl.title: The Literariness of the Milan Papyrus or 'What Difference a Book?'.
The New Posidippus. A Hellenistic Poetry Book
bibl.author: GUTZWILLER, Kathryn

bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Openings and closings. - ÉEpitÊmbia [AB 52]. - Liyikã [AB 4-5]. - Oﬁvnoskopikã [AB 21, 35]. - Larger structures: Ptolemies and poets [AB 118]. <epitumbia, lithika, oionoskopika>
GUTZWILLER Kathryn, The Literariness of the Milan Papyrus or 'What Difference a Book?'.
